name: Bloq
intro: Building infrastructure for the multi-blockchain future
introduce: Bloq is a blockchain infrastructure firm building for DeFi, mining, the metaverse, and more. Bloq provides infrastructure services from prototype to production and beyond, including staking solutions, node cluster, blockchain APIs. Bloq’s expertise in infrastructure gives it the insights to deliver some of innovative products in hot sectors, including Vesper Finance, Titan, Lumerin and more.
